summary: Whenever you kill an enemy using Dawnbreaker, Meridia says "A new hand touches the beacon". Don't ask.
descriptionHtml:
[url=https://www.reddit.com/r/skyrim/comments/8hqxm6/when_choosing_ones_weapon_in_skyrim_there_are/dymu74c/]Inspired by this Redditor
[/url]ï»¿

The mod changes the Dawnbreaker's Enchantment to add a custom script effect which effects the voice. All other changes (a sound marker and a sound descriptor) shouldn't conflict.

During a 30-second test with an existing save no problems occurred, and Meridia said her line as expected.

I have no idea if this works with SSE, if it does and you believe it is really necessary to do so, feel free to reupload it.
author: deingottapophis
